description:
■GAME SYSTEM
This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game).
*Point the screen with a cursor to solve riddles, and story goes on.

■STORY
In the era of wars and chaos-

I creeped in opponents' castle
But, got captured

In the castle and the prison
Are Full of deadly tricks

Well, It's time to go
I don't train myself for nothing...
name: TRAPPED in The Tricky Prison
